fields.description: The data stored in the custom field for this specific BOM entry. Will be null if there is no data stored
A more detailed description of the custom field
Whether the custom field is active or not. Inactive custom fields are not displayed in the UI
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
The location of the object within the BOM entry's list of custom fields
The name of the custom field
The datatype of the custom field.
Whether the custom field is required, not recommended
Whether the required setting is recommended, not required

links.description: Resource listing options associated with this custom field. Present only for custom fields whose type supports creating options
